summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the sale to the Seattle-Snohomish Mill Company of timber cutting rights on certain City land (E 1/2 NE 1/4, Section 23, Twp. 22 N., R. 8 E., W.M.) in the Cedar River Watershed for a consideration to be paid in the form of a conveyance to the City of certain real property in Township 26 North, Range 10 East, W.M., Township 27 North, Range 10 East, W.M., Township 28 North, Range 11 East, W.M., township 29 North, Range 11 East, W.M., all to be exchanged for United States Forest Service land in the Cedar River Watershed and certain real property in Section 4, Township 26 North, Range 9 East, W.M., to be incorporated into the Tolt River Watershed; and authorizing execution of a timber sale agreement in such connection.
